title: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather dashboard app that allows users to input their selected cities from anywhere across the globe, calling to an API database and receiving various pieces of weather information. Also contains a 5 day forecast.

title: Password Generator
description: A randomised password generator that asks the user various questions to perfect their desired password. Also contains a button to copy generated password to clipboard.

title: Day Planner
description: A calendar application that allows the user to save events for each hour of a 9-5 work day. Using JavaScript, jQuery, moment.js

title: Fitness Tracker
description: The Fitness Tracker app allows the user to be able to view create and track daily workouts. Users will be able to log multiple exercises in a workout on a given day. Users will also be able to track the name, type, weight, sets, reps, and duration of exercise. If the exercise is a cardio exercise, the app is able to track your distance traveled. Uses Express, MongoDb and Moongoose technologies.

title: Fitness App
description: A group project creation. This is a fitness app designed to track your health!.  Using Express, Handlebars, JavaScript, MySQL, Passport and Sequelize.

title: Viewing Party
description: A group project creation.  Viewing Party is a movie club app that allows users to share their love for movies.  Using Axios, Express, Ionic, MySQL, Passport, React Sequelize, Typescript and the TMDB Movie API to import movies.
